title: Mesenchymal hamartoma of the liver: report of 30 cases and review of the literature
publication_info: JT Stocker, KG Ishak - Pediatric Pathology, 1983 - Taylor & Francis
snippet:
Thirty cases of mesenchymal hamartoma of the liver are presented and compared with 42 
previously published cases. The patients, 69% male, range in age from newborn to 10 years 
(average age 15 months, median age 10 months). Except for occasional cases in which the …

title: Mesenchymal stem cells: biology, pathophysiology, translational findings, and therapeutic implications for cardiac disease
publication_info: AR Williams, JM Hare - Circulation research, 2011 - Am Heart Assoc
snippet:

and differentiation with a broad tissue distribution. Initially described in bone marrow, MSCs

snippet:

title: A protocol for isolation and culture of mesenchymal stem cells from mouse bone marrow
publication_info: M Soleimani, S Nadri - Nature protocols, 2009 - nature.com
snippet:
